transportHolderNumber.title: Transport Holder Number
transportHolderNumber.description: This is an identifier of the physical trailer used for the shipment/appointment

transportHolderTypeCode.title: Transport Holder Type Code
transportHolderTypeCode.description: This describes the general type of transport holder.  Typical types are Trailer, Container.

trailerLicenseplateNumber.title: Trailer Licenseplate Number
trailerLicenseplateNumber.description: This is the licenseplate number of the trailer

visitTypeCode.title: Visit Type Code
visitTypeCode.description:
This field identified the purpose of the trailer. Possible values are :
- Live Unload -The trailer is unloaded but the tractor is still attached.
- Drop Unload - The loaded trailer is dropped in the yard. The loaded trailer 
 will be moved to the correct dock for unloading at a later point in time.
- Live Load - The trailer is loaded but the tractor is still attached.
- Pickup Load - An empty trailer was loaded at the dock. The driver arrives at a later point in time to pick up the loaded trailer.
- Pickup Empty - The driver has come to pick up an empty trailer.
- Drop Empty - The driver has come to drop off an empty trailer.

carrierCode.title: Carrier Code
carrierCode.description: This specifies the carrier for whitch the trailer holds the goods

locationReferenceCode.title: Location Reference Code
locationReferenceCode.description: This is the location where the trailer is currently at (Yard slot or dock door)

checkInTimestamp.title: Check In Timestamp
checkInTimestamp.description: This is the time the trailer was checked in on the yard

checkInAgentUserIdentifier.title: Check in Agent User Identifier
checkInAgentUserIdentifier.description: This is the person that did the check-in.

checkOutTimestamp.title: Check Out Timestamp
checkOutTimestamp.description: This is the time the trailer was checked out from the yard

checkOutAgentUserIdentifier.title: Check Out Agent User Identifier
checkOutAgentUserIdentifier.description: This is the person that did the check-out.

transportHolderTypeSizeCode.title: Transport Holder Type Size Code
transportHolderTypeSizeCode.description: This field represent the equipment type value used in Manhattan. This indicated the size of the trailer.

loadStatusCode.title: Load Status Code
loadStatusCode.description:
This field indicates if the trailer is fully or partially loaded 
- Loaded - Trailer is fully loaded
- Loading - Trailer is partially loaded

sealNumber.title: Seal Number
sealNumber.description: This field contains the seal number of the trailer

loadedPercent.title: Loaded Percent
loadedPercent.description: This field indicates the percentage of the trailer that is loaded

proNumber.title: Pro Number
proNumber.description: Carrier Manifest Number ( used as CMR in EMEA )
